DataElement.preferredName: Additional CAR T-Lymphocyte Agent Indicator Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Question to indicate whether a patient received additional CAR T-cell therapy involving a different agent than the previous therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A cell-surface receptor that has been engineered to combine novel features and specificities from various sources in order to enhance its antigen specificity. Engineered T-cells or B-cells will produce the specialized receptor that will be capable of binding to an epitope on its target cell._A thymocyte-derived lymphocyte of immunological importance that is long-lived (months to years) and is responsible for cell-mediated immunity. T lymphocyte cells form rosettes with sheep erythrocytes and, in the presence of transforming agents (mitogens), differentiate and divide. These cells have the characteristic T3 surface marker and may be further divided into subsets according to function, such as helper, cytotoxic, etc._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied._Added; extra; further.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Chimeric Antigen Receptor T-Lymphocyte Additional Agent
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A cell-surface receptor that has been engineered to combine novel features and specificities from various sources in order to enhance its antigen specificity. Engineered T-cells or B-cells will produce the specialized receptor that will be capable of binding to an epitope on its target cell.:A thymocyte-derived lymphocyte of immunological importance that is long-lived (months to years) and is responsible for cell-mediated immunity. T lymphocyte cells form rosettes with sheep erythrocytes and, in the presence of transforming agents (mitogens), differentiate and divide. These cells have the characteristic T3 surface marker and may be further divided into subsets according to function, such as helper, cytotoxic, etc.:Added; extra; further.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Concepts.definition: A cell-surface receptor that has been engineered to combine novel features and specificities from various sources in order to enhance its antigen specificity. Engineered T-cells or B-cells will produce the specialized receptor that will be capable of binding to an epitope on its target cell.

A thymocyte-derived lymphocyte of immunological importance that is long-lived (months to years) and is responsible for cell-mediated immunity. T lymphocyte cells form rosettes with sheep erythrocytes and, in the presence of transforming agents (mitogens), differentiate and divide. These cells have the characteristic T3 surface marker and may be further divided into subsets according to function, such as helper, cytotoxic, etc.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did patient receive an additi
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive an additional but different CAR T-cell therapy product during this reporting period?
